{include "affiliate_loader"} Be heard before end of day, May 3. {include "pre-header-spacing"}{beacon}

{include "default_salutation"} –

As we enjoy these early days of spring, we also reflect on a year of triumph and trials in our great state of Nebraska and across the country. Through it all, the ACLU has been a leading voice, pushing for what is right and what is just.

In Nebraska, our work would not be possible without you, our members, and without the leadership of our dedicated Board of Directors. Thank you.

As a card-carrying ACLU member in Nebraska, you have the right and privilege to participate in our annual Board of Directors election. You have until the end of the day on Sunday, May 2, to cast your votes. This year, the Board has advanced four incumbent candidates eligible for reelection for their current positions to our membership for your consideration. You can vote for one, some, or all the candidates as well as write-in candidates. In order to vote, you will need your membership number: {if account_number}{account_number}{else}No account number found{/if}.

Vote Now

If you have a question about your membership or would like to request a paper ballot, please contact Allie Curttright at acurttright@aclunebraska.org or 402-476-8091 x107.

Thank you for taking the time to be heard. Your vote ensures that we have the right board members to help us continue our fight to ensure a Nebraska where all of our rights are respected and where we all can thrive.

In friendship & freedom,

{signature = 'ed'} {include "affiliate_signatures"}
